reviews.review_msg: had him last fall, but never got a chance to rate him. He is a very good prof who will do everything to make sure u understand the contents. Reasonable guy too, but the class avg was relatively higher than other bus classes.

good guy, good lecture. i still hold a grudge cause one question worth 25% of the final couldn't be answered and i spent WAY too much time on that question which made my mark suffer considerably. i ended up with a C and i was going into the final wit 93%
he really cares about students and teaching. Exams r not too easy, but fair.
Excellent prof.  Really cares about the students.

Fantastic professor! Approachable, understanding, knowledgeable, and hilarious! She understands the struggles students face, makes herself approachable, is knowledgeable in the field of accounting, and her humor makes lectures worth attending. Ms. Garabedian is one of the best professors I have ever had at Simon Fraser University.
